name: Roadkill (new)
description:
Roadkill is a fast paced, multiplayer shooter where you drive armed vehicles in post-apocalyptic levels. Upgrade your vehicles and destroy your opponents. It's a simple game, kill or be killed.
Inspired by the classic game Twisted Metal .. its fast and fun!
Most shooters give you a crutch to aid in your poor shooting skills called a ‘crosshair’. Not here, nope. You have to aim your weapon, not just put a crosshair on your target, shoot and BOOM HEADSHOT!. Shots do have tracers to help you determine where the rounds are landing.
Use each maps features to your advantage as you hunt other players. Use dust storms and blizzards for cover, hide behind buildings, take evasive routes, use jumps to reach certain parts of the map.
Each vehicle is different; different armor, different speed, different handling and different weapons. Learn how to handle each vehicle and how to win on each map.
Collect powerups to gain additional ammo, rockets and nitro.
Features
  • Singleplayer or multiplayer
  • No pay to win upgrades or in-game purchases
  • Rocking soundtrack
  • Choose from over a dozen unique vehicles
  • Guns, Rockets and Nitro
  • Vehicles with physics that are FUN to drive
  • Fun maps with obstacles, traps and jumps
